Counter Strike, 

A classic FPS which has developed through many years. Global Offensive offers so many game styles, tactics and fun.
Hectic at times you will find yourself raging and being mad at the game countless of times, but that's how the game functions, the community might be toxic as anything, but the game, game-style and overall game play of this classic shooter makes up for it all, plus if you have a good team or enjoy playing with your friends regardless of if you lose or not, CS:GO is a must.

Since the game became free, a lot more hackers have entered the community, but you can level up and unlock prime status through simply playing.
Im still stuck in the tutorial but I've heard it's a good game.
